text.body_Text:
What better place to enjoy a quiet, relaxing time in a supreme example of God's creation. A visit to Genesee Home is a Sabbath Rest for renewal and refreshment of your ministry and marriage.

Our modest cost to pastoral couples is $395 per couple per week. You will be provided comfortable accommodations with your own well apportioned private room and bath. You are served excellent gourmet meals prepared with loving care especially for you. In addition, there are endless recreational opportunities available as well as peace and quiet so that you may enter into God's Sabbath Rest. At Genesee Home you set your own agenda and can be as active as you desire. Our pricing for all of this and more is $395 per week per couple. Visit our pricing and special offers page for more information.

Our prayer for you during your stay at Genesee Home is that you will experience a Sabbath Rest, be filled with God's Holy Spirit, be strengthened in your marriage and be sustained by God's living water. Our desire is to welcome you with hospitality and send you on your way filled with the peace of Christ.

We encourage you to complete our Request A Visit Form so we can reserve a space for you and your spouse to step out of your busy life and ministry and into God's presence.

My wife, Bev and I look forward to welcoming you as a guest of Genesee Home to enjoy a quiet, relaxing time in a supreme example of God's creation.
